Record.ClassificationPath: Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Signs and Symptoms/Neurologic Manifestations/Neurobehavioral Manifestations/Psychomotor Disorders/Apraxias/Gait Apraxia
Nervous System Diseases/Neurologic Manifestations/Gait Disorders, Neurologic/Gait Apraxia
Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Signs and Symptoms/Neurologic Manifestations/Gait Disorders, Neurologic/Gait Apraxia
Nervous System Diseases/Neurologic Manifestations/Neurobehavioral Manifestations/Psychomotor Disorders/Apraxias/Gait Apraxia
Behavior and Behavior Mechanisms/Neurobehavioral Manifestations/Apraxias/Gait Apraxia
Record.Description: Impaired ambulation not attributed to sensory impairment or motor weakness. FRONTAL LOBE disorders; BASAL GANGLIA DISEASES (e.g., PARKINSONIAN DISORDERS); DEMENTIA, MULTI-INFARCT; ALZHEIMER DISEASE; and other conditions may be associated with gait apraxia.
